name: Cheese Your Own Adventure
description:
Controls :  WASD movement keys, ENT is select and X is menu.

Features : 

⁌5 Characters to choose to recruit to your party

⁌6 Food Enemies 

⁌ANIMATED Sideview Combat (thanks to YANFLY plug-ins)

⁌1 Boss Battle

⁌1 custom weapon for each class.

⁌ Wow, a inn!

⁌A single merchant!!

⁌Weather effects (snow / rain)

This game won the "my son worked really hard on this game for at least 2 hours" award.

You can EAT Grilled Cheeses in this game so --- that's gotta be 5/5 star reviews!!! 

ADDED NEW PLUG-INS!

UPDATED : 10pm, 4-23-2021

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

REVIEWS : 

"I have suffered greatly. I am in great pain. You are responsible." -Kaitlyn Kitty after playing Cheese Your Own Adventure

"3/10"  -BigPoe
